description: A frozen island region that serves as the base of operations for the Accino Family. The area features ice-covered terrain, volcanic activity beneath the surface, and Don Accino's mansion where he stores his collection of captured pirate flags.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs Don Accino Battle Intensifies
keyEvents.description: The climactic battle between Luffy and Don Accino takes place across the frozen landscape of Lovely Land.
keyEvents.significance: Serves as the battleground for the final confrontation of the Ice Hunter Arc.

keyEvents.title: Don Accino Falls into Lava
keyEvents.description: Don Accino falls into the molten lava beneath Lovely Land but survives due to his heat-based powers.
keyEvents.significance: Reveals the volcanic nature of the region beneath the frozen surface.

keyEvents.title: Flags Scatter Across Lovely Land
keyEvents.description: When Don Accino crashes through the flag room, hundreds of pirate flags scatter across Lovely Land's sky.
keyEvents.significance: Creates a visually striking moment symbolizing the liberation of captured crews' symbols.

statusHistory.reason: Base of operations for the Accino Family during the Ice Hunter Arc

description: Don Accino's mansion within Lovely Land, featuring a large collection room where he stores hundreds of captured pirate flags as trophies. The mansion becomes a battleground during Luffy's confrontation with Don Accino.

keyEvents.title: Don Accino Reaches 10,000 Degrees in the Mansion
keyEvents.description: Don Accino reaches his maximum temperature inside his mansion during the battle with Luffy.
keyEvents.significance: The intense heat threatens to destroy the mansion and Don Accino's precious flag collection.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Sends Don Accino Through Mansion Wall
keyEvents.description: Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Jet Pistol sends Don Accino crashing through the mansion walls, creating massive destruction.
keyEvents.significance: Represents the turning point of the battle and destroys Don Accino's flag collection.

keyEvents.title: Flag Room Destroyed
keyEvents.description: Don Accino crashes through the flag room, sending hundreds of collected pirate flags flying into the air.
keyEvents.significance: Destroys Don Accino's trophy collection and symbolizes the liberation of the captured flags.

statusHistory.reason: Don Accino's residence and flag storage
Destroyed during Luffy's battle with Don Accino
